message.entry: The input argument must be a structure with the following fields: numInputSymbols, numOutputSymbols, numStates nextStates and outputs.
The numInputSymbols field must be a scalar value.
The numInputSymbols field must be a power of 2.
The numOutputSymbols field must be a scalar value.
The numOutputSymbols field must be a power of 2.
The numStates field must be a scalar, positive integer value.
The ''nextStates'' field must be an unsigned integer matrix with numStates rows and numInputSymbols columns.
Each element of the ''nextStates'' matrix must be between 0 and numStates-1.
The ''outputs'' field must be an octal matrix with numStates rows and numInputSymbols columns.
Each element of the ''outputs'' matrix (in decimal format) must be between 0 and numOutputSymbols-1.
The input argument must be a structure.
